thread.title: Court Bedford
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Court Bedford

author: Court Bedford
title: Court Bedford
text: This was the first time we entrusted a 3 day excursion to be planned by someone else and Goway did a fantastic job. Our adventure to Iguazu Falls after a South American /Antarctica cruise was everything we could hope for. We wondered if our transfers to and from the airports etc. would be there when we started but after the first day we 'knew' they would be. David set up a private guide at Iguazu that made the experience unforgettable and much better than if we had toured ourselves. Highly recommend Goway.
